name: UC Berkeley
notes: University of California, Berkeley, home to BAIR, IGI, and various research labs.

name: ScienceML Group, UC Berkeley
notes: Develops probabilistic and ML methods for biological data.

name: AI+Science, UC Berkeley
leader: Nilah Ionnidis, Aditi Krishnapriyan, Jennifer Listgarten, Yun S. Song
notes: Mission "(1) to leverage scientific insight to develop new machine learning methods, and (2) to develop and leverage new machine learning methods to advance science."

name: LMU Munich
notes: LMU Munich. Home to the Mages lab, among others.

name: Mages Lab, LMU Munich
notes: "[T]he research focus of our group lies on the joint analysis of the rich data about position and internal spaces from molecular to tissue scale, which can be generated with state-of-the-art experimental spatial omics methods."

name: The Hebrew University, Edmond J. Safra Campus
notes: The Hebrew University. Home to the Nitzan Group, among others.

name: Nitzan Group, The Hebrew University of Jerusalem
notes: "[W]e are interested in studying the emergence of complex behavior out of the interactions of simple dynamic units in biological systems."

name: Stanford
notes: Stanford University, Stanford, home to various research labs.

name: Dror Lab
notes: Molecular simulation, machine learning, and microscopy image data
